title: IoT Computing and Routing Algorithm Optimization: Experimental Pedagogy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Computer Networks, Programming Experience, and Understanding of Machine Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: A methodology exploration for integrating IoT technology into language education, targeting pre-service and in-service teachers.

learning_goals: An IoT computing model based on Mobile Edge Computing (MEC) and Deep Learning (DL) can be analyzed through experimental environments.
Routing algorithm optimization methods using Markov Decision Processes (MDP) and feature representation learning can be comparatively evaluated.
The optimization efficiency compared to traditional IoT computing and routing algorithms can be explained using quantitative metrics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
